quote: In-between every heartbeat is the force that beats it. This "Force" signifies the presence of God within--the giver of life. This "force" is indefinable, unidentifiable--with no shape, color or status. When we focus on this force with all our might, by focusing to recognize what exists in-between each heartbeat, we start to recognize the glimpse of our true nature.
author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana
